settings.text: We know music and understand its profound impact on people's lives. Our passion for melodies and rhythms drives us to explore various genres and trends, ensuring we stay updated and connected to the musical world.

custom_css: div > * {display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: start; align-items: center; padding-top: 30px;}
rich_text_WGrPWt.name: t:sections.rich-text.presets.name

settings.heading: OPENING
settings.description: It all began with the Santa Teresa family — a magical time where the journey started, and the fun never stopped...

settings.heading: ISRAEL RELOCATION
settings.description: We were never ready to stop — but Santa was. So we came back to Israel. For many reasons. But the biggest one? We weren’t done partying.

settings.heading: OPENING IN ISRAEL & TAMU COLLAB
settings.description: What a night with Red Axes! The energy, the music, and the crowd were insane. We launched our brand collab with Tamu, and we can’t wait to show you the clothing line we’ve been working on.

settings.heading: OUR VISION
settings.description: Get access to the most iconic underground parties around the world. Book your ticket and immerse yourself in unforgettable nights powered by music, people, and energy.
settings.image_alt: Crowd dancing at a night party

settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.
